jsocket.net

Class UDPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsocket.net.Connection
      • jsocket.net.UDPConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class UDPConnection
extends Connection
    Abstraction used for UDP based connections
